Articles.Content:
You and the rest of the users have become trapped in an elevator. The doors will not open and the elevator will not move. You must come up with a method of escape (Hatches, holes, teleportation, whatever). The next user will find a way to make your method unusable (Hatch is locked, Walls indestructible, dampening field) and suggest a new way, so on and so forth.

Remember, Do Not Derail Thread With Side Conversations Or The Like

The game begins.... Now!

EDIT: Something interesting would be to use only what your avatar could use.

Example: I burn a hole in the doors.

Edited November 5, 2013 by Starwhip
I shall cook up a nice serve of Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â¿Blue Starwhip snake?? to eat and pass the time.

You're going to have a hard time doing that..... dragon scales are pretty tough.

I attempt to cut a hole in the roof.

The cake is a lie, the cake is a pie...

Therefor the pie is a lie

but pi is the answer to life therefor PARADOX

I jump up and down really quicky trying to smash the floor open

(@ op try 

[SIZE=6][COLOR="#FF0000"][U][I][B][COLOR="#FF0000"] NO SIDE CONVERSATIONS...OR DERAILMENTS...OR GOING IN CRICLES[/COLOR][/B][/I][/U][/COLOR][/SIZE]

for the disclamer)

The floor collapse and open to a bottomless pit

I grab you with my tantacles, preventing you to fall.

I use the emergecy call system in the elevator

THere's no power

I try and pry the door open with with my sword staff thing

You open the door, foundation labs

I seal the door with my laser balster, "are you crasy!?"

I take your laser toy gun and smash it in my fist

I call in an exermentis because this elevator is HERASY

The doors were welded shut when I attempted to burn them open.... Oops.

I try pushing on both walls at the same time with my wings, to bend them.

EDIT: Wow, double ninja'd, and I didn't notice for about half an hour.

Edited November 5, 2013 by Starwhip

Crack! Oopsie, broken wings...

I try to open the top of the elevator

The elevator starts lurching violently every time you touch the roof, so you stop.

I start kicking the doors, trying to make an escape hole.

You hurt your foot, so you stop

I start imaginating a evil plan to escape this elevator
What the hell happened while I was gone. And where is my hole in the ceiling?

You can't come up with anything.

I start pushing the floor buttons in hope that one of them still work.

(The threads were locked up... and we're all stuck in here)
So i cant even sit on the top of the elevator using my corgi computer powers. Its so damn cramped in here.

... please for the love of god read the OP....

@ guy above that's doing it right

but none of the buttons work

I try and turn this elevator into an ISE so we have more room

How do you think of doing such thing, the laws of physic stop you before you can do anything of great impact (2cm bigger, cool)

I use my destiny points.

but they don't work becuase your on the wrong side of the 4th wall

I sit down and ponder life

Your thoughts have great depths, but lead nowhere

I put a shaped charge on the door and detonate it

The door is exploded, but behind it is... another door!

I use my magical rainbow dwarf powers to rip the doors open.

Guess what? More doors!

I try clawing my way out through the roof.

You break it, but it a endless shaft going upward

Im firing my LAZOR

The beam reflects off the doors and starts bouncing around inside, nearly incinerating everyone.

I'm gonna build a ASHPD (portalgun). It'll take a while, seeing as I don't really have hands.

No Moon goo! It couldn't work anyways!

I escape the elevator...
